      • useParam

        public java.lang.String useParam(java.lang.String param)
        Tries to get a String from a parameter and add the parameter to the request as an attribute
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The parameter's String

      • useParam

        public java.lang.String useParam(java.lang.String param,
                                 java.lang.String fallback)
        Tries to get a String from a parameter and add the parameter to the request as an attribute. Uses the fallback if the request doesn't have the parameter.
        Parameters:
        param - The name of the parameter
        fallback - A default
        Returns:
        The String held by the parameter

      • standardSetup

        protected void standardSetup()
                      throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Sets several attributes to their universal defaults, others to cookies and others to session details. Sets the Character Encoding to UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Shouldn't happen. Occurs if the server or client can't use UTF-8. Although that's extremely rare.

      • userIsMod

        public boolean userIsMod()
        Determines if the user that made a request is a moderator. Checks the AuthTable for the Tomcat session ID cookie's status.
        Returns:
        true if the user is a moderator, false otherwise.

      • userIsAuth

        public boolean userIsAuth()
        Determines if the user that made a request is an authorized user believed to be human. Checks the AuthTable for the Tomcat session ID cookie's status.
        Returns:
        true if the user is authorized, false otherwise.

      • getAuthSession

        public AuthSession getAuthSession()

        public boolean userHasAccount()

      • getAccount

        public Account getAccount()

      • setTheme

        public void setTheme()
        Adds a "theme" attribute to the request. This is used to chose a style sheet in a .jsp file.

                            throws java.io.IOException
        Used to prevent get methods on endpoints meant for submitting content
        Parameters:
        response - Response to use for the error
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Something went wrong with http
